latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Terminal Survey - Anatomy of Peasant Economy

dsDescriptionValue.value: The project "Anatomy of Peasant Economy" seeks to document the production, income-expenditure, and saving-investment activities of rural households .

keywordValue.value: Family characteristics, input-output in rice production, land assets, major consumer durables, inventories and financial assets, production, income, household expenditures

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 111;
